SEARCH
Package com.accoladehq.calendar.controller

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.accoladehq.calendar.controller.BookingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class BookingController extends Object
REST controller for managing calendar booking operations. Handles creation of owners, setting availability, searching slots, booking appointments, and listing upcoming appointments.

  • Method Details

    • createOwner

      @PostMapping("/owners") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createOwner(@RequestParam String username, @RequestParam(required=false) String displayName)
      Create a calendar owner. In a real system, this would be derived from authentication context.
      Parameters:
      username - The unique username of the owner.
      displayName - Optional display name of the owner.
      Returns:
      Response message indicating owner creation or existence.

    • addAvailability

      @PostMapping("/availability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addAvailability(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid AvailabilityRequest req)
      Set availability for a calendar owner.
      Parameters:
      req - Availability request containing start and end times.
      Returns:
      Success or failure message.

    • search

      @PostMapping("/slots/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SlotDto>> search(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid SearchSlotsRequest req)
      Search available slots for a given date and owner.
      Parameters:
      req - Search request containing username and date.
      Returns:
      List of available slots.

    • book

      @PostMapping("/appointments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> book(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid BookRequest req)
      Book an available appointment slot.
      Parameters:
      req - Booking request containing owner username, date, start time, and invitee details.
      Returns:
      The booked slot details.

    • listUpcoming

      @GetMapping("/owners/{username}/appointments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Appointment>> listUpcoming(@PathVariable String username)
      Retrieve a list of upcoming appointments for a calendar owner.
      Parameters:
      username - The owner's username.
      Returns:
      List of upcoming appointments.
